email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

We are looking to ship 25,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan of November 15-20?

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m, for this shipment. The initial freight quote is $42 per metric ton on a CIF basis. The laycan is November 15-20 as requested.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $42/MT is slightly higher than our budget. Given the current market conditions, could you consider revising the rate to $38/MT?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

We understand your budget constraints. After reviewing the market, we can offer a revised rate of $40/MT. This is our best offer considering the vessel's availability and the current market rates.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of $40/MT. Please proceed with the arrangements for the MV OCEAN TRADER with the laycan of November 15-20.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress. The demurrage rate will be $12,000 per day after the agreed laytime.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily
